reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of BIOL 121, GEOB 102, GEOB 103.
This course is open to all UBC students. If you are missing the prerequisite or have difficulty registering, please contact the instructor (suzie.lavallee@ubc.ca).
description: Fundamental concepts in conservation science. Different philosophies, perspectives, and disciplines used in setting priorities for managing biodiversity at all scales.
